form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL Examination of Applicants for United States Visas, FORM 157 ( Rev. 5-78

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/25/2023 PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS NEW DELHI FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION 26th Nov'88 CITY COUNTRY At west American Consul at NEW DELHI INDIA NAME AGE SEX BAWA SINGH 73 M I certify that on the above date I examined WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON U 271090 CHANDIGARH 30/4/83 I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class-A, B, or C-diagnosis, and pertinent details*): 26th Nov'88 NORMAL Chest X-ray report from Dr. AGGARWAL Blood serological report VORL NON REACTIVE from Dr. N.P.S.CHAWLA. H.T.L.V.III TEST FOR HIV - NEGATIVE Other special report(s) (when needed) from Dr. P.S.CHAWLA. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR for TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT MBBS.FRCP.F IC A. FACC . FCCP. 29th Nov'88 50157-102 Continue on reverse side if necessary. OPTIONAL FORM 157 (Rev. 5-78) GPO : 1985 o - 465-885 Dept. of State Dr 0 N. P. S.CHAWLAA
